ValidationRule.description: NICC-055369 Certain fields on the Internal Project record type are not editable to most users after the project has been Approved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Commercial_Operation_Projects", NOT( ISNEW() ), Approved__c = TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED( Legal_Compliance__c ) , ISCHANGED( Required_for_Security_Compliance__c ), ISCHANGED( First_Year_Revenue_Increase__c ), ISCHANGED( Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Increase__c), ISCHANGED( Annual_Revenue_Increase_Confidence__c) ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Permission.Edit_AH_Project_Backlog_Internal_Projects = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Benefits information cannot be changed after the project has been approved. Please speak with the Project Owner, or refer to the Internal Project Prioritization Intake documentation for further information.
